altername_name: Bomberman B-Daman Bakugaiden: The Road to Victory
name: B-Daman Bakugaiden: Victory e no Michi
overview: In the Play mode, the player can choose between three characters from the main series. Once selected, the player appears in a board room, where he meets NPCs and enemies. In the Combat mode, the player can increase their attacks, defense, HP and more in a single turn by utilizing cards, as well as using their B-Da armor and robots. The characters have their own individual abilities, helping them defeat enemies.
